about_the_game: If you like retro arcade shooters, Zomb Bomb is the game for you. With 40+ stages of non stop action, you'll stay on the edge of your seat every step of the way. 5 crazy boss battles will keep you coming back for more. But high score is King, yes the person with the top high score is the best player. Fight your way through waves of zombies, dragons and much more.
